segments.text: Honestly, this whole scene is starting to make me feel quite frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman possibly not notice the sink overflowing onto the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring out in a continuous sheet, right at her feet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer obliviousness is almost unbelievable and frankly, quite irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, with their reckless cookie heist on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a recipe for disaster, and it's making me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of all that water damage to the cabinets and floor is appalling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who will have to clean up this colossal mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a waste of water, a risk to safety, and an impending headache.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself getting angry at the sheer negligence displayed here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation could have been avoided so easily with a little more attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a mess in the making, and it's upsetting to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
